titleStmt.title: A short discourse to prove the usefulness of vomiting in fevers, by plain reasoning and the authority of the best physicians, ancient and modern. By Charles Oliphant, doctor of Medetine
titleStmt.author: Oliphant, Charles, d. 1719.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed for Thomas Carruthers, and sold at hi [sic] shop in the Parliament Closs,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the Folger Shakespeare Library.
